CustomField.formula: IF(Maturity_Index__c = 8, "Finished compost", IF(Maturity_Index__c = 7, "Finished compost with few limitations (pH,EC)", IF(Maturity_Index__c = 6, "Curing stage", IF(Maturity_Index__c = 5, "Active compost towards curing", IF(Maturity_Index__c = 4, "Active compost", IF(Maturity_Index__c = 3, "Very Active compost", IF(Maturity_Index__c <= 2, "Raw compost",NULL)))))))
CustomField.label: Maturity Interpretation
